articles.author: Hannah Devlin
articles.title: Elephant seals sleep for just two hours a day, deep dive research reveals - The Guardian
articles.description: Marine mammals typically sleep in 10-minute bursts during deep, 30-minute dives to avoid predators, scientists believe
articles.content: Seals dozing on the beach may appear to be enjoying the ultimate life of leisure. However, groundbreaking research has revealed that for most of their lives elephant seals sleep just two hours daily … [+3744 chars]
